summary.span: 提供导航和用户界面 (UI)，以跨多个步骤收集相关数据。

span.span: Provides navigation and a user interface (UI) to collect related data across multiple steps.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [向导组件Wizard Components](#components) - [向导的步骤Wizard Steps](#wizard_steps) - [数据收集向导Collecting Wizard Data](#collecting_wizard_data) - [向导的命令名称Wizard Command Names](#wizard_command_names) - [动态变化的步骤Dynamically Changing Steps](#dynamically_changing_steps) - [向导外观Wizard Appearance](#wizard_appearance) - [格式设置使用的布局模板Formatting Using Layout Templates](#formatting_using_layout_templates) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 可以使用控制转移到：You can use the control to: - 跨多个步骤收集相关的数据。Collect related data across multiple steps. - 分解较大的网页用于收集用户输入到较小的逻辑步骤。Break up a larger Web page used to collect user input into smaller logical steps. - 允许进行线性或非线性导航步骤。Allow for either linear or nonlinear navigation through the steps. ## 向导组件Wizard Components 控件由以下组件构成：The control is made up of the following components: - 一个由页面开发人员定义包含每个步骤的用户界面的步骤的集合。A collection of steps that contain the user interface for each step, as defined by the page developer. - 内置导航功能，用于确定要显示的相应按钮基于值。Built-in navigation capabilities that determine the appropriate buttons to display based on the value. - 可自定义以显示特定的信息所在的步骤的用户目前上标题区域。A header area that can be customized to display information specific to the step that the user is currently on. - 控件中的步骤可用于快速导航到侧栏区域。A sidebar area that can be used to quickly navigate to steps in the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果使用 Microsoft Visual Studio 2005，请注意，源视图中保持不变。If you are using Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, note that the is persisted in Source view. 如果您更改属性在设计视图中通过单击侧栏按钮，然后运行页面的第一步`Wizard`控件，因此可能会显示可能指向不同的步骤。If you change the property in Design view by clicking the sidebar buttons, and you then run the page, the first step of the `Wizard` control might not be shown because the might be pointing to a different step. ## 向导步骤Wizard Steps 每个中的步骤控件具有属性，用于确定具有的导航功能的类型。Each of the steps in the control has a property that determines the kind of navigation functionality that the step has. 如果未指定的值属性，默认值是。If you do not specify a value for the property, the default value is . 下表列出的可用设置属性和步骤的结果行为。The following table lists the available settings for the property and the resulting behavior of the step. `WizardStepType.Auto` 为该步骤呈现的 UI 的导航取决于在其中声明该步骤的顺序。The navigation UI that is rendered for the step is determined by the order in which the step is declared. `WizardStepType.Complete` 该步骤是要显示的最后一个步骤。The step is the last one to appear. 不呈现任何导航按钮。No navigation buttons are rendered. `WizardStepType.Finish` 步骤是收集用户数据的最后一个。The step is the last one that collects user data. **完成**呈现用于导航的按钮。The **Finish** button is rendered for navigation. `WizardStepType.Start` 该步骤是要显示的第一个步骤。The step is the first one to appear. 一个**上一步**不呈现。A **Previous** button is not rendered. `WizardStepType.Step` 该步骤是任何步骤之间第一个和最后一个。The step is any step between the first and last. 呈现用于导航的“上一步”和“下一步”按钮。**Previous** and **Next** buttons are rendered for navigation. ## 数据收集向导Collecting Wizard Data 使用控件，可以通过线性或非线性导航收集数据。Using the control, data can be collected through linear or nonlinear navigation. 非线性导航的一些示例是跳过不必要的步骤，或返回到以前完成的步骤，若要更改某个值。Some examples of nonlinear navigation are skipping unnecessary steps or returning to a previously completed step to change some value. 控件之间维护其状态的步骤，因此不需要之前的所有步骤中将保存到数据存储在一个步骤中输入的数据控件已完成。The control maintains its state between steps, so the data entered on a step does not need to be persisted to a data store until all the steps of the control have been completed. 或者，如果你想要持久保存到作为数据存储所收集的数据的每个步骤完成，例如何时引发事件，则应设置的属性对象传递给`false`，以便用户不能返回到以前完成的步骤和后已提交更改的数据。Alternatively, if you want to persist the collected data to a data store as each step is completed, such as when the event is raised, you should set the property of the object to `false` so that the user cannot return to a previously completed step and change the data once it has been submitted. ## 向导的命令名称Wizard Command Names 控件将继承以下的命令名称，从类和类： ， ， ，和。The control inherits the following command names from the class and class: , , , and . 向导控件将忽略这些命令名称，不包括任何特殊逻辑，用于启用这些命令来自动处理导航。The Wizard control ignores these command names and does not include any special logic to enable these commands to automatically work for navigation. 如果命令名称被删除，或在按钮中缺少控件，不会引发异常。If a command name is removed or is missing from a button in the control, no exception is thrown. 例如，如果按钮缺少的值，不会引发异常。For example, if the button is missing a value for , no exception is thrown. ## 动态变化的步骤Dynamically Changing Steps 可以使用方法或属性来动态更改当前显示中的步控件。You can use the method or the property to dynamically change the step that is currently displayed in the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果以编程方式添加在`Page_Load`事件处理程序，必须将在导航窗格添加到在之前页面加载该步骤。If you programmatically add a in the `Page_Load` event handler, you must add the navigation to that step prior to the page loading. ## 向导外观Wizard Appearance 外观控件是通过模板、 外观和样式设置完全可自定义。The appearance of the control is fully customizable through templates, skins, and style settings. 例如，可以使用， ， ， ，并属性，以自定义的界面控件。For example, you can use the , , , , and properties to customize the interface of the control. > [!NOTE] > 设置， ， ， ， ，或属性会重新创建的子控件控件。Setting the , , , , , or property recreates the child controls of the control. 因此，子控件的视图状态会丢失进程中。As a result, the view state for the child controls is lost in the process. 若要避免这种情况下，显式维护控件状态的控件的子控件显式，或避免将控件置于模板。To avoid this situation, explicitly maintain the control state of the control's child controls explicitly, or avoid putting controls inside of templates. 请注意，控件不支持特殊的 Microsoft Internet Explorer 呈现非标准或 quirks 模式。Note that the control does not support special Microsoft Internet Explorer rendering for non-standard or quirks mode. 若要获取最佳的 Internet Explorer 呈现使用控件，使用 XHTML 文档类型，默认情况下，Visual Web Developer 和 Visual Studio 中添加。To get the best Internet Explorer rendering using the control, use the XHTML doc type, which is added by default in Visual Web Developer and Visual Studio. ## 格式设置使用的布局模板Formatting Using Layout Templates 控制允许您指定控件的布局，而无需使用对应的 HTML`table`元素。The control lets you specify the layout of the control without requiring you to use an HTML `table` element. 相反，可以使用`LayoutTemplate`元素以指定的布局。Instead, you can use a `LayoutTemplate` element to specify the layout. 在模板中，创建控件以指示应在控件中动态插入项的位置占位符。In the template, you create placeholder controls to indicate where items should be dynamically inserted into the control. (这是类似于如何将模板模型控制的工作方式。)有关更多信息，请参见 属性。(This is similar to how the template model for the control works.) For more information, see the property. ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件，以便它将生成符合辅助功能标准标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何定义控件来收集用户的名称和地址，用于输入单独的发货地址的选项。The following code example demonstrates how to define a control to collect a user's name and address, with the option to enter a separate shipping address. 如果用户不会选择**SeparateShippingCheckBox**，从而发出请求以添加单独的发货地址控件移动，直接从`Step2`到`Finish`。If the user does not select **SeparateShippingCheckBox**, thereby issuing a request to add a separate shipping address, the control moves directly from `Step2` to `Finish`. 上`Finish`步骤中，用户可以选择返回到的开头通过单击控件**GoBackButton**; 但是，以便用户可以`Step2`因为的属性`Step1`设置为`false`。On the `Finish` step, the user has the option to return to the beginning of the control by clicking **GoBackButton**; however, it takes the user to `Step2` because the property for `Step1` is set to `false`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard/CS/wizardclasscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard/VB/wizardclassvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例是前面的示例中使用的 Web 页的代码隐藏文件。The following code example is the code-behind file for the Web page used in the preceding example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回中当前显示的对象控件。The property returns the object that is currently displayed in the control. 属性是只读的; 但是，您可以使用属性访问当前属性对象。The property is read-only; however, you can use the property to access the properties of the current object. 使用属性来动态更改为另一种对象。Use the property to dynamically change the to a different object. 或者，可以使用方法动态设置属性。Alternatively, you can use the method to dynamically set the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定哪个步骤设置下一步属性的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine which step to set as the next property of the control. 如果的值`CheckBox1.Checked`是`true`，则属性设置为`Wizard1.Step3`; 否则为属性设置为`Wizard1.Step2`。If the value of `CheckBox1.Checked` is `true`, the property is set to `Wizard1.Step3`; otherwise, the property is set to `Wizard1.Step2`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供的从零开始的索引中当前显示的对象控件。The property provides the zero-based index of the object that is currently displayed in the control. 您可以以编程方式设置属性控制哪个步骤向用户显示在运行时。You can programmatically set the property to control which step is displayed to the user at run time. > [!NOTE] > 如果使用 Microsoft Visual Studio 2005，请注意，源视图中保持不变。If you are using Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, note that the is persisted in Source view. 如果您更改属性在设计视图中通过单击侧栏按钮，然后运行页面的第一步`Wizard`控件，因此可能会显示可能指向不同的步骤。If you change the property in Design view by clicking the sidebar buttons, and you then run the page, the first step of the `Wizard` control might not be shown because the might be pointing to a different step. 如果设置的值为-1 以支持默认情况下不需要执行步骤的向导，出现以下行为：If you set the value of to -1 to support a wizard with no steps by default, the following behavior occurs: - 如果以声明方式设置为-1 或为-1 作为默认值，该控件将始终尝试呈现向导的第一步的集。If you declaratively set to -1 or set it to -1 as a default value, the control will always try to render the first step in the wizard. - 如果以编程方式设置为-1，该控件将不会呈现。If you programmatically set to -1, the control will not render. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来设置属性的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to set the property of the control. 如果的值`CheckBox1.Checked`是`true`，则属性设置为`Wizard1.Step3`; 否则为属性设置为`Wizard1.Step2`。If the value of `CheckBox1.Checked` is `true`, the property is set to `Wizard1.Step3`; otherwise, the property is set to `Wizard1.Step2`. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStepIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStepIndex/CS/wizardactivestepindexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStepIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStepIndex/VB/wizardactivestepindexvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以从派生类由于的仅访问其`protected`修饰符。The method can be accessed from a derived class only because of its `protected` modifier. 在派生类中，可以使用方法，以确定是否可以使用传入的索引设置属性。In a derived class, you can use the method to determine whether the index that is passed in can be used to set the property. 方法将返回`false`如果传入的索引是指对象，它被访问过而且其属性设置为`false`; 否则为它将返回`true`。The method will return `false` if the index that is passed in refers to a object that has already been accessed and has its property set to `false`; otherwise, it will return `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个名为的派生的类`CustomWizard`并重写方法。The following code example demonstrates how to create a derived class named `CustomWizard` and override the method. 上的侧栏区域的按钮时`CustomWizard`单击控件，方法调用以确定是否可以访问所选的步骤。When a button on the sidebar area of the `CustomWizard` control is clicked, the method is called to determine whether the selected step can be accessed. 一条消息然后写入通知所出现的情况的用户对包含网页。A message is then written to the containing Web page informing the user of what has occurred. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时**取消**按钮单击控件。The event is raised when the **Cancel** button on the control is clicked. 使用事件，以便提供附加的处理时**取消**单击按钮。Use the event to provide additional processing when the **Cancel** button is clicked. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定的事件处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify an event handler for the event. 当**取消**单击按钮时，页面将重定向到http://www.wingtiptoys.com/。When the **Cancel** button is clicked, the page is redirected to http://www.wingtiptoys.com/. summary.span: 获取或设置单元格内容和单元格边框之间的空间量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space between the contents of the cell and the cell border.

value.span: 单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的空间量（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The amount of space, in pixels, between the contents of a cell and the cell border.

value.span: 默认值为 0。

span.span: The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性控制的单元格内容和单元格边框之间的间距。Use the property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell border. 指定的填充量添加到单元格的所有四个边。The padding amount that is specified is added to all four sides of the cell. 列中的所有单元格都具有相同的单元格宽度;因此，间距已应用于列中最宽的单元格。All cells in a column share the same cell width; therefore, the spacing is applied to the widest cell in the column. 同样，同一行中的所有单元格具有相同的单元格高度。Similarly, all cells in the same row share the same cell height. 因此，间距已应用到的行中最高的单元格。Thus, the spacing is applied to the tallest cell in the row. 不能指定单个单元格的大小。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用并属性进行编程的布局以声明方式控制。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and properties to program the layout of the control declaratively. summary.span: 单击“完成”按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the **Finish** button is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时**完成**按钮单击控件。The event is raised when the **Finish** button on the control is clicked. 使用事件，以便提供附加的处理时**完成**单击按钮。Use the event to provide additional processing when the **Finish** button is clicked. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定的事件处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify an event handler for the event. 当**完成**单击按钮时，一条确认消息写入到`Label1`并且`Label1.Visible`属性设置为`true`，以便该消息显示在该步骤。When the **Finish** button is clicked, a confirmation message is written to `Label1` and the `Label1.Visible` property is set to `true` so that the message is displayed on the step. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardFinishButtonClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardFinishButtonClick/CS/wizardfinishbuttonclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardFinishButtonClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardFinishButtonClick/VB/wizardfinishbuttonclickvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的自定义内容上显示的导航区域的步骤控件。Use the property to specify the custom content that is displayed for the navigation area on the step of the control. 通过创建指定的导航区域上的呈现方式的模板中定义的内容步骤。Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the navigation area is rendered on the step. 该模板的自定义内容包含在对象。The custom content for the template is contained within the object. 你可以添加到自定义内容对象在设计视图中或通过定义通过使用模板编辑模式对象内联使用`FinishNavigationTemplate`标记。You can add custom content to the object either by using template-editing mode in design view or by defining the object inline using `FinishNavigationTemplate` tags. 内容可以是简单的纯文本或更复杂 （嵌入其他控件在模板中，例如）。The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example). > [!NOTE] > 中包含的对象属性必须包含两个控件，另一个使用其属性设置为"MoveComplete"和另一种具有其属性设置为"MovePrevious"以启用导航功能。The object that is contained in the property must contain two controls, one with its property set to "MoveComplete" and the other with its property set to "MovePrevious", to enable the navigation feature. 若要访问模板中以编程方式定义的控件，请使用的集合对象。To access a control that is defined in a template programmatically, use the collection of the object. 此外可以使用方法对象来查找该控件，如果控件具有指定属性。You can also use the method of the object to find the control, if the control has an property specified. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来创建自定义模板的导航区域步骤，用于控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a custom template for the navigation area of the step for the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用属性来定义自定义用户界面 (UI) 的控件。You can use the property to define a custom user interface (UI) for the control. 若要指定一个布局模板，添加`LayoutTemplate`元素内的控件标记。To specify a layout template, add a `LayoutTemplate` element inside the control markup. 内部`LayoutTemplate`元素中，添加的组件的占位符控件。Inside the `LayoutTemplate` element, add placeholders for the components of the control. 导航、 侧栏中和的向导步骤部分的占位符中，需要使用控件`LayoutTemplate`元素。Placeholders for the navigation, sidebar, and wizard-step sections of the control are required in the `LayoutTemplate` element. > [!NOTE] > 你可以修改布局模板中的**源**视图。You can modify the layout template in **Source** view. 编辑中的布局模板**设计**不支持视图。Editing the layout template in **Design** view is not supported. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何添加`LayoutTemplate`元素`Wizard`控件以及如何设置格式的组件`Wizard`控件中的使用`div`元素。The following example shows how to add a `LayoutTemplate` element to the `Wizard` control and how to format the components of the `Wizard` control by using `div` elements. 当控件呈现，则`div`元素将使用而不是 HTML 表，若要设置控件的格式。When the control renders, the `div` elements will be used instead of HTML tables to format the control.

summary.span: 获取一个对 对象的引用，该对象定义控件上导航区域中按钮的设置。

span.span: Gets a reference to a object that defines the settings for the buttons in the navigation area on the control.

value.span: 一个对 的引用，该对象定义 上导航区域中按钮的样式设置。

span.span: A reference to the that defines the style settings for the buttons in the navigation area on the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性上定义的导航区域中按钮的外观控件。The property defines the appearance for the buttons in the navigation area on the control. 属性是只读的; 但是，可以设置的属性它将返回的对象。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. 你可以以声明方式设置这些属性在窗体`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性类 (例如， `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`). 你可以以编程方式设置的属性在窗体`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`). 常用的设置包括自定义背景颜色、 文本颜色和字体属性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 样式设置与个别按钮样式合并属性。The style settings for the property are merged with the individual button styles. 在应用中的个别按钮样式属性的任何设置将重写中的相应设置属性。Any setting that is applied in the individual button style properties overrides the corresponding setting in the property. 例如，如果您设置`FinishPreviousButtonStyle.ForeColor`属性设置为`"red"`并`NavigationButtonStyle.ForeColor`属性设置为`"green"`，为按钮的颜色将为红色，因为各个样式设置属性替代的设置属性。For example, if you set the `FinishPreviousButtonStyle.ForeColor` property to `"red"` and the `NavigationButtonStyle.ForeColor` property to `"green"`, the color for the button will be red because the individual style settings of the property override the settings of the property. 以下属性样式由个别按钮样式设置重写：The following property styles are overridden by individual button style settings: - - - - - - - -

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的自定义内容上显示的导航区域的步骤控件。Use the property to specify the custom content that is displayed for the navigation area on the step of the control. 通过创建指定的导航区域上的呈现方式的模板中定义的内容步骤。Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the navigation area is rendered on the step. 该模板的自定义内容包含在对象。The custom content for the template is contained within the object. 你可以添加到自定义内容对象在设计视图中或通过定义通过使用模板编辑模式对象内联使用`StepNavigationTemplate`标记。You can add custom content to the object either by using template-editing mode in design view or by defining the object inline using `StepNavigationTemplate` tags. 内容可以是简单的纯文本或更复杂 （嵌入其他控件在模板中，例如）。The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example). > [!NOTE] > 中包含的对象属性必须包含两个控件，另一个使用其属性设置为`"MoveNext"`另一个使用其属性设置为`"MovePrevious"`，以启用导航功能。The object that is contained in the property must contain two controls, one with its property set to `"MoveNext"` and one with its property set to `"MovePrevious"`, to enable the navigation feature. 若要访问模板中以编程方式定义的控件，请使用的集合对象。To access a control that is defined in a template programmatically, use the collection of the object. 此外可以使用方法对象来查找该控件，如果控件具有指定属性。You can also use the method of the object to find the control, if the control has an property specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的集合构成对象控件。The property returns a collection of objects that make up the control. 可以使用要访问集合中包含的对象以编程方式控制。You can use the collection to access the objects that are contained in the control programmatically. 使用， ， ，和操作的方法以编程方式在集合中的对象。Use the , , , and methods to manipulate the objects in the collection programmatically. > [!NOTE] > 如果使用 Microsoft Visual Studio 2005，请注意，源视图中保持不变。If you are using Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, note that the is persisted in Source view. 如果您更改属性在设计视图中通过单击侧栏按钮，然后运行页面的第一步`Wizard`控件，因此可能会显示可能指向不同的步骤。If you change the property in Design view by clicking the sidebar buttons, and you then run the page, the first step of the `Wizard` control might not be shown because the might be pointing to a different step. 如果控件包含多个集合，集合将合并。If the control contains multiple collections, the collections will be merged. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建以编程方式控制，以及如何使用方法中添加对象添加到集合。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control programmatically and how to use the method to add objects to the collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardSteps#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardSteps/CS/wizardstepscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardSteps#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardSteps/VB/wizardstepsvb.aspx#1)]
